column2: select AD.ADJUST_AMT, AD.ADJUST_VALIDITY, (isnull(AD.ADJUST_AMT,0) - isnull(INF.AMOUNT,0)) as ADJ_AMT_CHECK, (isnull(AD.ADJUST_VALIDITY,0) - isnull(INF.DAYS,0)) as ADJ_VALIDITY_CHECK, AD.ADJUST_STATUS, AD.TRANSPARENT_DATA1, AD.TRANSPARENT_DATA2 from PMDB..PM_ADJUST_TRANSACTION AD inner join PMDB..PM_FILE_ADJUST FL on (AD.FILE_ID = FL.FILE_ID) inner join PMDB..PM_ADJUST_TRANSACTION I on (FL.FILE_ID = I.FILE_ID) inner join PMDB..PM_INF_ADJUST_BALANCE_D INF on (I.SO_NBR = INF.SO_NBR and INF.ORDER_LINE_NO = 1)  where INF.ORDER_ID = @order_id
